name: GPT Buddy
description: Fullstack MERN application designed to help users interact with OpenAI's language models. Allows users to input text and receive suggestions or responses from the AI.

name: Break the Ice
description: Fullstack MEN application that allows users to submit various icebreaker questions and catalogue responses

name: Destiny Character Viewer
description: Application designed to allow users to view their character information for the videogame Destiny. Developed in Python with Django

name: Tamagotchi
description: Simple HTML game that asks you to care for a generated creature
